text: After years of testing, we have learned much about the parasites through Project Iniectio Prava.
Unfortunately, we have learned nothing about how to eliminate them.
These organisms possess no chemical weakness that does not also harm the host.
They perfectly mimic the host's immune system, making every possible cure lethal to both.
Because of this, the research team is dividing into two separate projects.
We no longer see a purpose in searching for a cure. That effort cost us nearly half the lower floor's population.
Instead, we have chosen to pursue a long-term solution: developing a system capable of defending against infection.
Perhaps, in time, eradication will follow. We can only hope.
All resources of this division will now be devoted to creating the Unified Response and Guardian Oversight Systemâ€”URaGOS.
